response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This is a significant discount from its original valuation, reflecting our commitment to finding the right buyer who truly appreciates its worth. We are confident that you will find this investment worthwhile, considering its potential impact on your business or personal endeavors. Should you decide to proceed, please let us know, and we will arrange for a seamless transaction. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
